question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. space shuttle
B. camera crane
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The image is a 2D projection, and without a depth map or clear foreground/background cues, it is ambiguous whether the space shuttle or the camera crane (which appears to be a person's hand holding a camera) is closer. The hand/camera is partially obscuring the view, suggesting it's in front, but this is not definitively clear without depth information.
